timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,6 +11,11 @@ assignees: ''
 
 Check documentation: https://checkstyle.org/config_xxxxxx.html#NameOfAffectedCheck
 
+The cli helps in touching the roots of the problem better.
+It describes the problem better than 1,000 words.
+
+[Download and run cli]('https://checkstyle.org/cmdline.html#Download_and_Run')

replies.bodyText:
I think download and run cli link is very important to give in the first place for 2 reasons:

User may not have a latest checkstyle and could raise issue already solved. Now they could download the latest cli before creating an issue, and also get the help of how to run the cli from direct documentation.
User may not have used cli before, maybe he is using the editor's checkstyle. He will get to know about the cli and running it with terminal, and also could better understand the issue's bash template before modifying it.
replies.author: Abhishek-kumar09

timeline.bodyText:
This is not necessarily true; when compiling using preview features with the --enable-preview flag, javac will output something like:
Note: TestClass.java uses preview language features.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:preview for details.

Perhaps just specify that the user must show successful compilation of the example?
timeline.author: nmancus1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,6 +11,10 @@ assignees: ''
 
 Check documentation: https://checkstyle.org/config_xxxxxx.html#NameOfAffectedCheck
 
+Download and run checkstyle cli: https://checkstyle.org/cmdline.html#Download_and_Run
+
+Cli describes the problem better than 1,000 words.
+
 ```bash
 /var/tmp $ javac YOUR_FILE.java
 #[[MAKE SURE THERE IS NO OUTPUT]]

timeline.bodyText:
.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md

main word here is "TEMPLATE", template means that all text will be text of issue author, as he did wrote it himself.
Template means that all text should not be removed and user just need to fill gaps.
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't solution have expected CLI output for "fix"?
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,16 +9,31 @@ assignees: ''
 
 ---
 
+I have downloaded the latest cli from: https://checkstyle.org/cmdline.html#Download_and_Run
+I have executed the cli and showing it below, as cli describes the problem better than 1,000 words
+
+**How it works Now:**
+
+```bash
+/var/tmp $ javac YOUR_FILE.java
+#[[MAKE SURE THERE IS SUCCESSFUL COMPILATION]]
+
+/var/tmp $ cat config.xml
+#[[PLACE YOUR OUTPUT HERE]]
+
+/var/tmp $ cat YOUR_FILE.java
+#[[PLACE YOU OUTPUT HERE]]
+
+/var/tmp $ RUN_LOCALE="-Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US"
+/var/tmp $ java $RUN_LOCALE -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar -c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java
+#[[PLACE YOUR OUTPUT HERE]]
+```
+
 **Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
 A clear and concise description of what the problem is.
 
 **Describe the solution you'd like**
 A clear and detailed description of what you want to happen.

replies.bodyText: I have added it that they could provide the cli suggested output for their fix.
